title: Wireless Emergency Alerts play sound even when the phone is set vibration only
content:
After this December 2020 update,

Wireless Emergency Alert is now FORCED to make sound!

Even when the phone is set vibration only, that alert makes massive sound and makes me embarrassed.

I could make it vibrate only before this update.

In my country they push this 'emergency' messages like spam. A LOT. The sound is really pain in the ass.

Why? At least make the sound quieter. It's like thunder now!
